title: All Your Perfects
description: THEN: The last thing Quinn expected was to meet the love of her life just outside her fianc√©'s front door. A year after leaving behind their cheating partners, Quinn and Graham are in a perfect relationship that seems designed by fate. NOW: Seven years later, their perfect love is threatened by their imperfect marriage. The memories, mistakes, and dreams that they have built up over the years are tearing them apart. The one thing that could save them might also be the very thing that pushes their marriage past the point of no return.
author: Colleen Hoover
